title: TNAU Notification 2026 - Walk-in interview for 12 Junior Research Fellow, Project Assistant and Other Posts
description: The Tamil Nadu Agricultural University (TNAU) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 12 Junior Research Fellow, Senior Research Fellow, Project Assistant, and Administrative Technical Assistant Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech, B.Sc., M.Sc., Post-graduation, can apply for the TNAU Notification 2026. The intere...
